global.NoConnection_welcomeSubtitle: To access the platform you need to set up a wallet. If you already have one, just select the button for your preferred wallet to connect it. If you don’t, click "I don't have a Wallet" button and follow the step by step instructions.
global.NoConnection_noWalletTooltip: I want to install Nifty Wallet
global.NoConnection_alert: You must be logged in with your wallet to access
global.NoConnection_waitForSign: In order to continue you need to connect your wallet to the protocol. Please wait for the "Sign" message from your wallet that will appear on your device and proceed to sign.
global.NoConnection_alertPleaseConnect: Please, connect your wallet using the “connect” button on the top right section of the platform.
global.NiftyTutorial_setupYourWallet_text: To operate on the platform you need to connect your wallet to the RSK network. Follow the steps and we will help you.
global.NiftyTutorial_getYourWallet_text: Click on Download and add Nifty Wallet to Chrome from the web store
global.NiftyTutorial_keepItClose_text: Click on the extensions icon and pin Nifty Wallet from the list
global.NiftyTutorial_createPassword_text: Generate a password for a new wallet or import an existing one
global.NiftyTutorial_keepItSafe_title: Save it and Keep it safe
global.NiftyTutorial_keepItSafe_text: Save the twelve words in a safe place to continue
global.NiftyTutorial_keepItSafe_externalLink: Why do I need this words?
global.NiftyTutorial_connectToRSK_text: Open your wallet and click on the Superior Menu to change the network. Select RSK from the list
global.NiftyTutorial_signMessage_text: This sign has no cost and it’s necessary to log in the platform
global.MetamaskTutorial_setupYourWallet_text: To operate on the platform you need to connect your wallet to the RSK network. Follow the steps and we will help you.
global.MetamaskTutorial_expandView_text: Open Metamask from Chrome Extension. Click on the superior menu and Select Expand View.
global.MetamaskTutorial_addCustomNetwork_text: Click on the Network Menu and Select Custom RPC
global.MetamaskTutorial_copyLink_text: Fill the form with the data and click on Save
global.MetamaskTutorial_connectWithMetamask_tex: Return to Money On Chain Tab. Click on Next on the Metamask window
global.MetamaskTutorial_connectTheAccount_text: Click on Connect on the Metamask window
global.MetamaskTutorial_signMessage_text: Click on Sign on the Metamask window
global.LiqualityTutorial_setupYourWallet_text: To operate on the platform you need to connect your wallet to the RSK network. Follow the steps and we will help you.
global.LiqualityTutorial_openSettings_text: Open Liquality from Chrome Extension. Click on the superior menu and select Settings.
global.LiqualityTutorial_changeToRSK_text: To do that: Activate Default Web3 Wallet. Select RSK as Web3 asset.
global.LiqualityTutorial_connect_text: Click connect on the Liquality window
global.LiqualityTutorial_signTheMessage_text: Click on Sign on the Liquality window.
global.RewardsTableContainer_tooltip_1: Confirming: Confirming your request, we are waiting 10 blocks to start Processing it.
global.RewardsTableContainer_tooltip_2: Processing: We have your request, please wait... sending your tokens soon. (Up to 24hs delays).
global.RewardsTableContainer_tooltip_3: Sent: Already sent yours MoC Tokens to your account.
global.RewardsBalance_MoreInfo: Learn more about the MOC Liquidity Mining Program for BPro holders at https://moneyonchain.com/liquiditymining/
global.RewardsOptions_AmountToStakePlaceholder: MoC Tokens I want to stake
global.RewardsOptions_AmountToStakeNote: Staking MoC Tokens receive rewards from the MoC Staking Rewards Program. You will be able to unstake at any time with a release delay of 30 days (no rewards received during this period). After this period you will be able to "Withdraw".
global.RewardsOptions_AmountToUnstakePlaceholde: MoC Tokens I want to unstake

RewardsOptions_UnstakingNote.first: Unstaking will take 30 days. During this period no MoC Rewards will be received.
RewardsOptions_UnstakingNote.second: either to restake your MoC tokens anytime or to withdraw after 30 days period.

global.StakingOptionsModal_AllowanceDescription: Before continuing with the staking you must set the allowance so that the staking system can access the tokens. This has to be done only once and it doesn't lock any tokens from your wallet.
global.StakingOptionsModal_StakingDescription: Staked MoCs will receive rewards from the MoC Staking Rewards Program. You can unstake your MoC's whenever you want, the withdraw process will take 30 days
global.StakingOptionsModal_UnstakingDescription: You will be able to withdraw your MoC Tokens to your wallet in 30 days. You can restake them anytime in this period.
global.StakingOptionsModal_WithdrawDescription: After withdrawal your MoCs tokens will be available in your wallet
global.StakingOptionsModal_RestakeDescription: After confirming, this amount of MoC Tokens will be removed from the processing queue and staked again. They will immediately start receiving MoC Staking Rewards.
global.Error_maxExceeded: The number exceeds the maximum allowed
global.ConfirmTransactionModal_MOCFee_Disclaime: This fee will be deduced from the transaction value transferred
global.ConfirmTransactionModal_AmountMayDifferD: Amounts may be different at transaction confirmation
global.MintOrRedeemToken_AmountMayDiffer: * Amounts may be different at transaction confirmation
global.Notification_notification_description: Transaction is in pending state, please wait to blockchain confirm the operation.
global.ReserveAllowanceModal_AllowanceDescripti: Before continuing with your operation you must set the allowance so that the MoC Contract can access the tokens. This have to be done only once and it doesn't lock any tokens from your wallet
global.ReserveAllowanceModal_ProccessingAllowan: Processing Allowance, please wait. When it finished we are going to send the operation to the wallet
global.ReserveAllowanceModal_allowanceSendDescr: Please approve tx in your wallet to use MoC Token in the platform
